title: Buying Runes on PBE
body: Recently, I've been playing on PBE and everytime i try to buy runes it tells me that an error occured. Note that I'm buying new runes and I don't own any amount of them. The error says "You attempted to buy or own the maximum amount of this item" or something similar. Please Help. Thanks!

replies.body: im want account pfb ples im not have im wont give vip hlp me gays im dont no know is give pfb  and im need  campion {{champion:157}} {{champion:81}} and thanks
